price: Ẹnikẹ́ni tí ó bá ń tẹ̀lé ti Allāhu àti ti Òjíṣẹ́ Rẹ̀ nínú yín, tí ó sì ń ṣe iṣẹ́ rere, A máa fún un ní ẹ̀san ìlọ́po méjì. A sì ti pèsè ìjẹ-ìmu alápọ̀n-ọ́nlé sílẹ̀ dè é.”
arabic: ۞ وَمَن يَقۡنُتۡ مِنكُنَّ لِلَّهِ وَرَسُولِهِۦ وَتَعۡمَلۡ صَٰلِحٗا نُّؤۡتِهَآ أَجۡرَهَا مَرَّتَيۡنِ وَأَعۡتَدۡنَا لَهَا رِزۡقٗا كَرِيمٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: waman yaqnut minkunna lillahi warasūlihi wataʿmal ṣāliḥan nu'tihā ajrahā marratayni wa-aʿtadnā lahā riz'qan karīman
